missing_information: Exact amount earned from side jobs
Dates and nature of side job work performed
Names and contact information of side job clients
interview_questions: Can you provide an estimate of how much you earned in total from your weekend handyman jobs?
What specific types of work did you perform for these side jobs?
Do you have any records of the dates you performed this work and for whom?
Were any of your side job earnings over $600 from a single client?
Did you incur any expenses related to these side jobs that you paid out of pocket?
documentation_needed: Detailed log of side job income and expenses
Receipts for expenses related to side jobs

missing_information: Cost of Medicare Part B premiums
interview_questions: Do you have documentation showing the total amount you paid for health insurance premiums this year?
How much of your medical expenses were reimbursed by your insurance?
Did you travel to receive any medical care? If so, how many miles did you drive?
Can you provide documentation of your Medicare Part B premium payments?
Were there any other medical expenses you incurred that aren't reflected in these receipts?
documentation_needed: Explanation of Benefits (EOB) forms from insurance company

missing_information: Exact dates Tyler lived at home
Total amount paid for Tyler's support
Tyler's total income for the year
interview_questions: Can you provide the exact dates that Tyler lived in your home during the tax year?
What was the total amount you paid for Tyler's support, including education expenses?
Did Tyler have any income of his own this year? If so, how much?
How much did you pay specifically for Tyler's tuition and other education expenses?
Did Tyler's mother provide any financial support at all during the year?
documentation_needed: School records showing Tyler's enrollment dates
Receipts for tuition and education expenses paid
Detailed breakdown of support provided to Tyler

missing_information: Percentage of home used exclusively for work
Employer's policy on remote work requirements
Frequency of working outside the home office
interview_questions: What percentage of your home is used exclusively for your work?
Can you provide a breakdown of your total home expenses, including mortgage or rent, utilities, and insurance?
Do you have any written documentation from your employer about their work-from-home requirements?
How often do you work outside of your home office, such as at coffee shops?
Are there any other home office expenses you incurred that aren't reflected in these receipts?
documentation_needed: Floor plan or measurements of home office space
Itemized list of all home expenses
Log of days worked in home office vs. other locations

missing_information: Fair market value of donated furniture
Detailed description of donated furniture items
Tax ID number for Children's Hospital
interview_questions: Can you provide a detailed description of each piece of furniture you donated?
On what date(s) did you make the furniture donations?
How did you determine the $2,000 value for the donated furniture?
Do you have any photos or other documentation of the furniture before donation?
Can you contact the Children's Hospital to get their tax ID number and a proper donation receipt?
documentation_needed: Detailed list of donated furniture with fair market values
Proper donation receipt from Children's Hospital with tax ID
IRS Form 8283 for non-cash charitable contributions
